      • set

        public void set(String key,
                Object value)
        Description copied from interface: Memory
        Set the value of the provided key. This is typically called in setup() and/or terminate() of the VertexProgram. If this is called during execute(), there is no guarantee as to the ultimately stored value as call order is indeterminate.
        Specified by:
        set in interface Memory
        Parameters:
        key - they key to set a value for
        value - the value to set for the key
